paper_abstract: We present several known formalizations of theorems from computational complexity in bounded arithmetic and formalize the PCP theorem in the theory PV1 (no formalization of this theorem was known). This includes a formalization of the existence and of some properties of the (n, d, lambda)-graphs in PV1.
paper_title: LOGICAL STRENGTH OF COMPLEXITY THEORY AND A FORMALIZATION OF THE PCP THEOREM IN BOUNDED ARITHMETIC
